title: FS: T3 Turkey Reds - MANY!   Raw, untouched, beautiful
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS: T3 Turkey Reds - MANY!   Raw, untouched, beautiful
posts.post_content:
Hello,

******NOTE:  Since this thread received an unexpected bump today (3/6/17), I thought it would be good to note that I have a fully updated list of 45 T3s available for sale - graded, ungraded, rarities and even a Cobb.  Send me an email and I'll send you the list. Thank you. 

Listed below are most of the cards from my recent mini-find of Turkey Reds. (Cobb has its own thread). These cards are new to the hobby, originated in Virginia and were purchased from the grandson of the original owner.  They're all raw and so where I've noted grading, it's my estimate of what I think PSA might say. I obviously can't guarantee a grade, it's just my estimate.  These cards sat stacked and stashed away for many decades. They're not altered in any way, most just suffering from light and honest wear.  If you have an interest in any of these, please send me an email (craigdiamondt3@yahoo.com) and I'll send photos for your review. Thanks for looking, hope you find something you like.  These are great cards. 

PLEASE FEEL FREE TO MAKE ME AN OFFER.  HAPPY TO WORK WITH YOU. 

Here goes. 

4. Bresnahan - 2 $275, no crease, chips on front. 
5. Crawford - 1MK $170, horiz crease, writing 
7. Camnitz - 2 $165, lower right crease, o/w VG+
8. Clarke - 3.5 $500, upr right crease, o/w VGEX

15. Elberfeld -1 $100 pinhole o/w VGEX+

19. Joss - SOLD
20. Jordan - 4.5 $450, nice and clean VGEX++
21. Kleinow - 4 $325, clean, no crease, honest wear
21. Kleinow - 2.5 $225, no crease, paper chip on picture, o/w VGEX+
22. Krause - 4 $325, clean, no crease, honest wear
23. Lajoie - SOLD
24. Mitchell - SOLD
25. McIntyre -3 $300 chips on back o/w VGEX ++
29. McConnell - 4 $350, clean, no crease, honest wear
30. Mullin - 4 $325, clean, no crease, light flaking on back 
31. Magee - 1.5 $110, creasing upper right and lower left
33. Pfeister - 4 $325, nice and clean, no crease 
33. Pfeister - 3.5 $300, lower left corner crease, o/w VGEX
34. Rucker - 4MK $250, clean and nice, pencil on back 
34. Rucker - 2 $175, border pinch o/w VGEX+
37. Sallee - 4 $350, clean, no crease, honest wear
39. Waddell - 4 $1100, clean, no crease, honest wear
41. Wiltse - 3 $250, upper left corner crease o/w VGEX
42. Young - SOLD

116. Schmidt - 3MK $200, pencil on back, light crease

Please feel free to ask questions.  If you are looking for a specific T3, please ask as I have others available, graded and raw.  

Thanks for looking,
Craig
